title: Phase 10: Production Verification & Final Checks
description: Run complete Definition of Done checklist: verify live site loads, all features work, no console errors, Lighthouse >90, responsive works, scheduled builds run every 6 hours, documentation complete, all beads issues closed. Deliverable: Production-ready site meeting all requirements.

title: Phase 4: Implement Client-Side Features
description: Integrate Pagefind search, implement 3 filters (category, verification, date), implement keyboard navigation (j/k/o/Enter/?/t/s/h/Esc), implement theme toggle with persistence. Deliverable: All interactive features working.

title: Phase 1: Fix Go Pipeline & API Integration
description: Fix Flathub API endpoint (XML→JSON), update data models with new fields (installs, favorites, verification), align JSON schema with firehose pattern. Deliverable: Working Go pipeline outputting src/data/apps.json
close_reason: Fixed Flathub API endpoint (XML→JSON), updated data models with new fields (installs, favorites, verification), aligned JSON schema with firehose pattern. Pipeline working, outputting src/data/apps.json successfully.

title: Phase 3: Rebuild Main Page with Firehose Layout
description: Port complete index.astro structure: header with search/theme/help, sidebar with about/stats/filters/featured app, main content with infinite scroll. Add data transformation logic, 4 inline scripts (theme init, keyboard nav, home handler, help handler). Update CSS with Flathub colors. Deliverable: Complete main page with Flathub branding.

title: Phase 6: Create Comprehensive AGENTS.md
description: Create new AGENTS.md based on firehose structure. Replace CNCF→Flathub terminology. Document architecture, components, common tasks, debugging. Keep current Landing the Plane and bd workflow sections. Deliverable: Comprehensive AGENTS.md documentation.

title: Phase 2: Port Firehose UI Foundation
description: Copy 9 missing components (ErrorBanner, FilterBar, InfiniteScroll, InfoBox, KeyboardHelp, SearchBar, ThemeToggle, CollapsibleAppGroup, FeaturedAppBanner) and 6 lib functions (markdown, schemas, truncate, semver, appGrouping, featuredApp). Update AppCard with markdown rendering. Deliverable: All UI components ported.

title: Phase 8: Testing & Quality Assurance
description: Execute 10-phase test plan: build validation, preview testing, browser testing (all features), responsive design (320-1920px), keyboard nav, performance (Lighthouse >90), cross-browser. Deliverable: Fully tested application passing all checks.

title: Phase 5: Featured App Banner System
description: Create FeaturedAppBanner.astro component with Flathub blue gradient styling. Implement daily rotation algorithm (verified apps, >1000 installs, recent updates, deterministic by day). Integrate into sidebar. Deliverable: Daily featured app banner working.

title: Epic: Add Homebrew Linux Releases Integration
description: Add support for tracking all Linux-compatible releases from Homebrew. This includes: 1) Research Homebrew API/data sources for Linux formulae, 2) Create Go fetcher for Homebrew data, 3) Integrate with existing pipeline, 4) Add UI support for displaying Homebrew packages alongside Flatpak apps, 5) Update filtering and search to support both sources. Deliverable: Working integration showing Homebrew Linux releases with changelogs.

title: Phase 9: Configure GitHub Actions & Deployment
description: Update .github/workflows/deploy.yml with 6-hour cron schedule (0 */6 * * *). Enable GitHub Pages (Source: Actions). Test workflow execution. Verify scheduled runs work. Deploy to production. Deliverable: Live site at github.io serving correctly with automated 6-hour updates.

title: Phase 7: Update Supporting Documentation
description: Update README.md with live site URL, features list, architecture diagram, build instructions. Update package.json metadata. Add credits to firehose inspiration. Deliverable: Updated documentation files.
